contentfulSermon.title: 40 Days in the Word: Week 5 - How to Study a Bible Study

fields.notesFormatted:
1. Observation: What does it say?

    Philippians 2:19-30

    Context, Context, Context

    Who - What - When - Where - Why - How

  2. Interpretation: What does it mean?

    Don't forget to check your work- correlation.

    Characteristics of God's Honorable Servants:

    1. Caring vs. 21

      1 Peter 3:8

    2. Consistent vs 22

      1 Corinthians 15:58

      James 1:12

    3. Cooperative vs 25

      Titus 3:10

      John 17:20-23

      Colossians 3:23

    4. Considerate vs 26

      Romans 15:1

    5. Courageous vs 27 & 30

      1 Corinthians 16:13

  3. Application: What will I do about it?

    Reveal- ask God and others

    Respond- repent, reconcile, and react

    Rely- on the Holy Spirit
